mapper.select: select * from (select rownum rnum, b.* from (select qna.*, nvl(cnt,0) cnt from qna left outer join (select board_num, count(*) cnt from comments group by board_num) c on qna.board_num = c.board_num) b where rownum <= #{end} ) where rnum >= #{start} and rnum <= #{end} order by rnum desc
mapper.insert:
select nvl(max(BOARD_NUM),0)+1 from qna
insert into qna ( BOARD_NUM, BOARD_ID, BOARD_PASS, BOARD_SUBJECT, BOARD_CONTENT, BOARD_READCOUNT, BOARD_DATE) values ( #{BOARD_NUM}, #{BOARD_ID}, #{BOARD_PASS}, #{BOARD_SUBJECT}, #{BOARD_CONTENT}, #{BOARD_READCOUNT}, sysdate)
